question: In what time will 1000 Rs. amounts to 1331 Rs. at 20% per annum, compounded half yearly?
explanation:
Let the required time be t years. Interest is compounded half yearly. 
âˆ´ Time = 2t half years and rate = 10%
$latex \\therefore 1000\\left ( 1+\\frac{10}{100} \\right )^{2t} = 1331&s=1$
$latex => \\left ( \\frac{11}{10} \\right )^{2t} = \\frac{1331}{1000}&s=1$
$latex => \\left ( \\frac{11}{10} \\right )^{2t} = \\left ( \\frac{11}{10} \\right )^{3}&s=1$
$latex => 2t = 3,\\ t = \\frac{3}{2}\\ years\\ or\\ 1\\frac{1}{2}\\ years&s=1$
